item.title: Web Scraping with R: A Great Resource for Language Learning and Teaching
item.description: 1 . Introduction 1.1 . Tools Needed 2 . Example 1: Scraping Webpages 2.1 . Wikipedia entries 2.2 . More ideas 3 . Example 2: Scraping Blogs 3.1 . The Big Bang Theory transcripts 3.2 . More ideas 4 . Example 3: Scraping Online Newspapers 4.1 . Social Commentary from CNN 4.2 . More ideas 5 . Summary 1 . Introduction Recently, I helped a colleague scrape text from Wikipedia for a class project.
